result.title: Welcome!
result.content:
Al Salam Alykom Everyone,

Welcome to Alexandria University, Faculty of Engineering training group, we'll use this group to communicate, discuss problems, do our private contests and post editorials.

Please try to keep this group as formal as possible in order to maximize the benefits, you are encouraged to ask questions and help others, so spam, memes and ":3 :3" comments are not welcome here.
